process.title: AI Development Process
process.description: Our systematic approach to integrating AI capabilities into mobile applications with proven methodologies and best practices.

step1.title: AI Strategy & Planning
step1.description: Define AI use cases, select appropriate models, and design the intelligent features architecture for your mobile app.

step2.title: Model Training & Optimization
step2.description: Train custom ML models, optimize for mobile performance, and implement edge AI capabilities for efficient processing.

step3.title: Mobile App Integration
step3.description: Integrate AI models into mobile apps with optimized user interfaces and seamless real-time processing capabilities.

step4.title: Deployment & AI Monitoring
step4.description: Deploy to app stores with continuous AI model monitoring, performance analytics, and automated model updates.
